entry.title: Awhile a go I posted a funny bug I got where the player would ‚Äúlose weight‚Äù every time they jumped. Once the novelty of it all wore off, I decided to fix it. Wasn‚Äôt a crazy fix and now you can jump without fading away into nothingness! #fyp #gamedev #indi
